name: PLAYER_STAMINA_PENALTY
info: How much will decrease stamina pool by using 1 stamina point.  Default: 0.01.  Set to 0 to turn it off.

name: PLAYER_RECOVER_STAMINA_INCREASE_HUNGER
info: How many Calories will be removed for recovering 1 stamina point.  Default: 0.07.  Set to 0 to turn it off.

name: PLAYER_RECOVER_STAMINA_INCREASE_THIRST
info: How much thirst will be added for recovering 1 stamina point.  Default: 0.008.  Set to 0 to turn it off.

name: PLAYER_RECOVER_STAMINA_INCREASE_FATIGUE
info: How much fatigue will be added for recovering 1 stamina point.  Default: 0.004.  Set to 0 to turn it off.
